@iraqe & @Sarom:

HdBrStreamExtractor is easier, it converts dts to ac3 right after extracting audio track. Then you just have to mux it back with mkvmerge. I always use it for my lg tv. Just a note: I think you converted the whole mkv, you should convert only the audio track and mux it back so the video track stays untouched.
